solver.sharedMemory.combinedSolver.pipelined

Class UnfoldingScheduling

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.Z3Context
      • solver.Z3Solver
        • solver.sharedMemory.combinedSolver.pipelined.UnfoldingScheduling
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LatencyConstraints, PeriodConstraints, ProcessorConstraints, SolverFunctions, PeriodProcConstraints

    public class UnfoldingScheduling
extends Z3Solver
implements ProcessorConstraints, LatencyConstraints, PeriodConstraints, PeriodProcConstraints
    The pipelined problem is solved by unfolding the application graph by a number of times and scheduling it. The constraints for this method are defined in the paper - "Meeting deadlines cheaply"
    Author:
    Pranav Tendulkar

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class solver.Z3Solver

        Z3Solver.SatResult
